title: advise to all
body: riot = owned by china is following its steps, you cant have freedom of speech, u shouldn't talk back when others trash talk u.  SO sit quietly and enjoys the game !

replies.body: you used to be able to say anything before china bought its shares and took over

The reason that you can't talk trash in game is because it's unpleasant for the people you're playing with, not because Tencent acquired the remaining shares of Riot Games. It's not too much to expect respect and civility from strangers outside the game, so why can't Riot apply those same principles to the game?
